volumeInfo.description: "Managing Information Technology, 4/E focuses on management of information technology topics vital to a successful career as a manager. The book has been completely updated to reflect the rapid changes in information technology and new types of business applications. Up-to-date content includes the latest changes in computer systems and software, such as Windows 2000, Linux, and XML; the growth of cyber-businesses and the e-business activities of traditional companies; and social and ethical issues of information technology. For managers in the field of information technology.
volumeInfo.title: Managing Information Technology

searchInfo.textSnippet: The book has been completely updated to reflect the rapid changes in information technology and new types of business applications.
